√riṣ 'be hurt'

present: [4.] ríṣyati etc. V.+  ríṣyate etc. E.+   -- [1.] reṣat  réṣāt  

[perfect: rireṣa  ]

aorist: [1.] rīḍhvam   -- [2.] ariṣan etc.  riṣātha etc.  ríṣant  rī́ṣant?   -- [3.] rīriṣat etc. V.+  rīriṣīṣṭa  ririṣīṣṭa  ririṣes   -- [5.] areṣīt  

[future: reṣiṣyati  reṣitā  reṣṭā  ]

verbal: riṣṭá V.+  riṣé  riṣás  

secondary: intensive: reriṣ-   -- desiderative: rírikṣati etc.  ririṣiṣa-  rireṣiṣa-   -- causative: reṣáyati etc. V.+  riṣayádhyai  

derivatives: ríṣ  réṣ? B.  -riṣa AV.  reṣa B.C.  -reṣin S.  riṣaṇa- RV.  reṣaṇá V.  ríṣṭi V.B.S.  riṣīka? C.  reṣmán AV.B.  ririkṣú RV.
